content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max Müller, thank you for coming to see the apartment. Before we start discussing the rental price, can you tell me a bit more about yourself? What kind of job do you have, and how long do you plan to stay in New York? This information will help me determine the best rental price for you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am a student. I will be staying in New York for 6 months. I want to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content:
Thank you for letting me know, Max. Based on your budget and the length of your stay, I would like to propose a rental price of €900 per month. This price takes into account the size of the apartment and the current market rates in New York.

Is this rental price within your budget, or would you like to negotiate further?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of €900 per month. Thank you for your offer.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: You're welcome, Max. I'm glad you found the rental price to be acceptable. If you have any other questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I'm happy to work with you to make your stay in New York as enjoyable as possible.
name: Heinrich Heine
